ygData.subject: Re: Compiling Bard Song Information
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You might check out my compilation at http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/spellsong.htm I know that the locations, levels and instruments are all accurate -
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:01 PM 5/13/99 -0700, you wrote:
>
> Greetings fellow Bards!
> As most of you already know, I have a living document on EQVault called
> "Bard Spell Analysis v1.4". Since it was put up on that site, I have
> received some good feeback, including corrections as well as some minor
> additions. I'm up to v 1.6 that I will be sending it in Monday for posting.
> If anyone has any information not in there already, I'd appreciate if you
> could drop me a line.
> Looking through some of the archives, I've noticed that there is another
> Bard song document? Can someone forward me a copy? I'd like to merge that
> information into what I have already (and give credit where it's due, of
> course).


You might check out my compilation at
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/spellsong.htm
I know that the locations, levels and instruments are all accurate - but for
facts, well - some of my descriptions are rather colorful.



Talies on Bristlebane
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
